description: Unified Interactive LLM Metrics Dashboard - Performance, Cost, and Provider Comparison in one view

options.content:
# RAG System - Interactive LLM Metrics (ITDM)
**Performance** | **Cost Analysis** | **Provider Comparison** — All metrics show LKE / EKS / GKE side-by-side. Edit pricing variables in dropdowns above.

## Provider Infrastructure Comparison
*Click panel title → Edit to modify values, or use Dashboard Settings → Variables*

| | 🟢 **Akamai LKE** | 🟠 **AWS EKS** | 🔵 **GCP GKE** |
|:---|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| **Region** | ${lke_region} | ${eks_region} | ${gke_region} |
| **Instance Type** | ${lke_instance} | ${eks_instance} | ${gke_instance} |
| **GPU Model** | ${lke_gpu} | ${eks_gpu} | ${gke_gpu} |
| **GPU Architecture** | ${lke_arch} | ${eks_arch} | ${gke_arch} |
| **GPU Memory** | ${lke_vram} | ${eks_vram} | ${gke_vram} |
| **CUDA Cores** | ${lke_cuda} | ${eks_cuda} | ${gke_cuda} |
| | | | |
| **GPU $/hr** | $${lke_gpu_cost} | $${eks_gpu_cost} | $${gke_gpu_cost} |
| **CPU $/hr** | $${lke_cpu_cost} | $${eks_cpu_cost} | $${gke_cpu_cost} |
| **Mgmt $/hr** | $${lke_mgmt_cost} | $${eks_mgmt_cost} | $${gke_mgmt_cost} |
| | | | |
| **LLM Model** | ${model_name} | ${model_name} | ${model_name} |
| **Embedding** | ${embedding_model} | ${embedding_model} | ${embedding_model} |

> **Edit values:** Dashboard Settings (⚙️) → Variables → Select variable → Change default value

panels.title: 💰 Cost Analysis (edit pricing in dropdowns above)

options.content:
**Pricing (per node):**
| | LKE | EKS | GKE |
|---|---|---|---|
| GPU $/hr | $${lke_gpu_cost} | $${eks_gpu_cost} | $${gke_gpu_cost} |
| CPU $/hr | $${lke_cpu_cost} | $${eks_cpu_cost} | $${gke_cpu_cost} |
| Mgmt $/hr | $${lke_mgmt_cost} | $${eks_mgmt_cost} | $${gke_mgmt_cost} |

**Nodes:** ${gpu_nodes} GPU, ${cpu_nodes} CPU
